mapper.select: SELECT RECORD_NO, TO_CHAR(RECORD_DATE,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') "RECORD_DATE", DONATOR_NO, ACCEPTOR_NO FROM DONATION_RECORD LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" ON (DONATOR_NO = MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, MEMBER_NO, TYPE_NAME, RECORD_NO FROM DONATION_PRODUCT JOIN PRODUCT_TYPE USING(TYPE_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
